resources.string:
21. Engineering Calculator 
 The calculator application should allow you to perform the following operations: 
* Addition, 
* Subtraction, 
* Multiplication, 
* Division, 
* Calculating the percentage of a number, 
* Calculating the factorial of a number, 
* The ability to specify an expression in parentheses, 
* Calculating the square power of a number, 
* Raising a number to an arbitrary power, 
* Calculating the square root of a number, 
* Calculating the root of an arbitrary power of a number, 
* Calculation of trigonometric functions: sin, cos, tg, 
* Calculating the decimal logarithm of a number, 
* Calculating the logarithm of degree e, 
* Introduction of the numbers Ï€ and e with an accuracy of 10 decimal places. 
 
The application should allow you to enter both integers and decimals. 
The application should allow you to delete the last entered character, as well as reset all entered data.
Error! You cannot close a parenthesis with an empty value!
Error! Too many dots in number!
